tool_description: A markdown to html service, translate a string of markdown into sanitized html.
name: Markdown2HTML
title: Markdown2HTML

api_list.name: Convert To HTML
api_list.description: Convert provided markdown string into a sanitized string of html.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://markdown2html.p.rapidapi.com/markdown"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "markdown2html.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://markdown2html.p.rapidapi.com/markdown"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "markdown2html.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
